Anchors Cafe is Closed Sorry for any inconvenience Why Research is Important Research Rocks! Dolphin Research Center is a nonprofit research and education facility in the Florida Keys. During your visit you may see DRC working on various cognition and behavior studies. Questions encouraged! Learn more about these amazing animals. Support Our Manatee Rescue Team Manatee Rescue Team You support and generosity helps to enable our Manatee Rescue Team! Book Now! Swim with Dolphins in the fabulous Florida Keys - The Ultimate Vacation Thrill! Get to know a dolphin while you do a variety of fun behaviors together including the exciting dorsal pull! Book Today! Our Animal Family Looks Forward to Seeing You in the Florida Keys! See dolphins and sea lions, birds, and even a tortoise! Fun-filled, interesting behavior sessions and education presentations offered all day. Book Now Spend the Day with a Dolphin in the Florida Keys! Make a new dolphin friend in Ultimate Trainer for a Day. Do you have what it takes to be a marine mammal trainer? Donate Now. Thank you! The Promise of a Forever Home in the Florida Keys We rely on guest visits, participation in our programs, and donations to care for our animals, learn more in research, educate about conservation, help injured manatees and more. Thank you for your support. Book a Program X Dolphin Research Center offers many ways, including swimming with dolphins, where you can interact with dolphins and sea lions. Use the slider below to see the programs and click on the photo to learn more or make a reservation. General Admission Dolphin Sunset Celebration Memory Maker Meet Dolphin Encounter Dolphin Splash Ultimate Trainer for the Day VIP Experience Researcher Experience Meet a Dolphin Exclusive Private Dolphin Encounter Paint with a Dolphin < BACK View Program Details Reserve General Admission HOURS: Open 7 days a¬†week September 2, 2025-December 14, 2025¬†9:00am to 3:30¬†p.m. Last admissions at 3:00 p.m. December 15, 2025-September 7, 2026¬†9:00am to 4:30 p.m. Last admissions at 4:00¬†p.m. Closed¬†on¬†Memorial Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day ADMISSION PRICE: Adults: $36.00 Children ages 4-12: $25.00 Children ages 3 and under: FREE General Admission US Military/Veteran Discount: $16¬†OFF (Discounted Price: $20.00) Must present US Military ID. Discounts/Coupons cannot be combined. All guests under the age of 18 must be accompanied by a paying adult. Prices are per person. Please note: General Admission does not include hands-on contact with any marine mammals. ¬†Interactive programs are¬†be purchased separately. Gift Certificates: For details visit: http://www.dolphins.org/giftcertificates Get our most competitive General Admission rates by purchasing your tickets on-line! Purchase a General Admission and spend some time observing the dolphins and sea lions¬†in training sessions or interacting with each other during¬†their private time.¬†Watch your friends and family participate in public programs from one of our general access areas. < BACK View Program Details Reserve Dolphin Sunset Celebration Price: $249 per person Member Price: $199 per person Gift Certificates: For details visit: http://www.dolphins.org/giftcertificates Ages: 5 Yrs and Up. A paying participating adult (18+Yrs) must accompany a child 5-7 years old. For safety and liability reasons, pregnant women are unable to participate in this program. Guests with Disabilities: Do you or one of your group have a physical or cognitive limitation? Please contact our Coordinator prior to booking Duration: 1.5 Hours Total Join us for an unforgettable evening at Dolphin Research Center with our BRAND NEW, once-a-month exclusive event! When Dolphin Research Center closes to the public, the magic begins. Step behind the scenes for a rare after-hours adventure where you'll become part of the dolphins‚Äô enrichment‚Äîfeeding them specially prepared jello treats and witnessing their individual dolphinalities up close. You‚Äôll also have the chance to engage in fascinating conversations with our marine mammal experts, gaining insight into dolphin research, behavior, training, care, and more. As the sun dips below the horizon, raise a glass of champagne and toast to another perfect day in paradise‚Äîsurrounded by the sounds of nature, the beauty of the Florida Keys, and the joyful energy of our dolphin family. Limited availability ‚Äì offered just once a month! Reserve your spot today for this intimate, unforgettable experience. If your desired program is sold out, please check back on the morning of to see if there are any openings. < BACK View Program Details Reserve Memory Maker Meet Price:¬†$105 per person (includes¬†all-day general admission). Price does not include reservation fee. Gift Certificates: For details visit: http://www.dolphins.org/giftcertificates DRC Members , to book Memory Maker Meet in advance, please email memberservice@dolphins.org. Ages: 1 yr¬†and Up. Children ages 1-7 years must be assisted in the program by an adult (Age 18+). Adult¬†must pay General Admission. If you are pregnant, please call us before booking this program at 305-289-0002¬†or contact us via email at exception.request@dolphins.org. Please contact our Coordinator prior to booking Duration: Your in-water experience will last 20-25 minutes. Enjoy watching the dolphins, a theater presentation, our Sprayground, or a snack at the food cart until your program begins. Our most popular dolphin program! Includes a dorsal pull. If your desired program is sold out, please check back on the morning of to see if there are any openings. Exclusive Private Dolphin Encounter: $2189-$2689¬†for one to six people¬†in a private group. Includes a digital photo package of all members of your group,¬†all-day general admission,¬†and a one-year membership to DRC for each guest! Your special swim experience will occur at one of our docks designated specifically for you and your party. Call 305-289-0002 for details and to reserve¬†or email exception.request@dolphins.org. Individuals and families/groups of up to 10 people can reserve online for Dolphin Encounter . For groups larger than 10, please call 305.289.0002 or email exception.request@dolphins.org for assistance. Thank you. < BACK View Program Details Reserve Dolphin Splash Note: Individuals and families/groups of up to 10 people can reserve online for Dolphin Splash . For groups larger than 10, please call 305.289.0002 or email exception.request@dolphins.org for assistance. Thank you. Price: $149 per person ages 4 years and up(includes¬†all-day general admission). Price does not include reservation fee. Gift Certificates: For details visit: http://www.dolphins.org/giftcertificates Ages: Great for all ages! Open to individuals, couples, and families.¬† A paying, participating adult¬†(18+ Yrs) can hold one child 3 years old¬†and under on hip during program for no additional cost.¬†A paying participating adult (18+ Yrs) must accompany children 4-7 years old. For safety and liability reasons, pregnant ladies are unable to participate in this program Guests with Disabilities: Do you or one of your group have a physical or cognitive limitation? Please contact our Coordinator prior to booking Duration: Approximately 20-25 mins in-water on a submerged platform. The ideal program for families with young children! If your desired program is soldout, please check back the morning of to see if there are any openings. < BACK View Program Details Reserve Ultimate Trainer for the Day Price: $745¬†per person . Includes all-day admission for participant. Please contact our Coordinator prior to booking Duration: Approximately 5 mins If you've craved the chance to touch a dolphin, this is for you! If your desired program is soldout, please check back the morning of to see if there are any openings. < BACK View Program Details Call to Reserve Exclusive Private Dolphin Encounter Immerse yourself in the Exclusive Private¬†Dolphin Encounter experience of your dreams! Get ready for a fun-filled, exciting time. You and your group of up to six people will be the only guests at your dock. Your trainer greets you prior to your program to discuss your goals and special requests. Enjoy more connection time with the dolphin(s) with individualized attention. Price: $2189-$2689 (depending on date)¬†for one to six people in a private group. Includes a digital photo package of all members of your group; all-day admission; and a one-year membership to DRC for each guest! Ages: All ages, but children younger than 8 must be accompanied by a participating adult. For safety and liability reasons, pregnant women are unable to participate in this program. Guests with Special Needs: Do you or one of your group have a physical or cognitive limitation? Please let us know prior to booking so we can connect you with our Coordinator about what assistance might be needed. Duration: Your in-water experience lasts approximately 20-25 minutes. Availability & Questions: This exclusive opportunity is offered only once a day and cannot be directly booked online. To check availability or to reserve, please call 305-289-0002 or email exception.request@dolphins.org. Thank you! < BACK View Program Details Reserve Paint with a Dolphin Price:¬†$95¬†per person (includes¬†all-day general admission). Price does not include reservation fee. Children ages 1-7 years must be assisted in the program by an adult (Age 18+). Adult must pay General Admission. If you are pregnant, please call us before booking this program at 305-289-0002 or contact us via email at exception.request@dolphins.org. Guests with Disabilities: Do you or one of your group have a physical or cognitive limitation? Please contact our Coordinator prior to booking Duration: Approximately 10 mins on the dock Work with our gray artists and create a one-of-a-kind masterpiece! If your desired program is sold out, please check back the morning of to see if there are any openings. Membership X Being a Dolphin Research Center Member includes free annual admission, newsletters, online access to our Members Only website, special event invitations, discounts at our onsite and online Gift Shops, and other benefits depending on membership level. Membership is great way that you or, as a gift, someone special can support DRC by becoming a member of our extended family. Join Our Family Research X Research Spotlight < BACK Research Spotlight Details Research Spotlight DRC's staff and dolphins are currently working on a number of cognitive and behavioral research projects that relate to their overarching goal of mapping the dolphin mind and understanding how dolphins think and learn. Check here to see what's in the research spotlight, publication announcements and details of DRC findings. This information is also featured in a bi-monthly newsletter for members. Education X Dolphin Research Center Training Institute DolphinLabs for You Group DolphinLab For Teachers Marine Mammal Info < BACK Dolphin Research Center Training Institute Details Dolphin Research Center Training Institute The DRC Training Institute offers an Professional Animal Trainer program for continuing eduation purposes and the Dolphin Academy program for those looking to pursue a career in animal training. < BACK DolphinLabs for You Details DolphinLabs for You Our DolphinLab programs offer a combination of educational seminars, workshops, demonstrations, in water and hands-on learning activities with our dolphins, sea lions and staff family. Three DolphinLab programs, DolphinLab Adult, DolphinLab Teen and DolphinLab Group, are available and suited for any learning level. Some DolphinLab programs also offer the unique opportunity for participants to earn college credit while swimming with dolphins. < BACK Group DolphinLab Details Group DolphinLab Our DolphinLab programs offer a combination of educational seminars, workshops, demonstrations, in water and hands-on learning activities with our dolphins, sea lions and staff family. Three DolphinLab programs, DolphinLab Adult, DolphinLab Teen and DolphinLab Group, are available and suited for any learning level. Some DolphinLab programs also offer the unique opportunity for participants to earn college credit while swimming with dolphins. < BACK For Teachers Details For Teachers Dolphin Research Center offers many educational opportunities for teachers, including in-classroom curriculum with detailed lesson plans and opportunities for group visits and field trips. Discovering Dolphins, a CD-ROM for grades K through 8, includes curriculum, hand-outs, photographs, sound recordings and more. Explore DRC's resource library for teachers as well as information on outreach and distance learning. < BACK Marine Mammal Info Details Marine Mammal Info Explore detailed marine mammal information including guides on dolphins, sea lions, manatees, training marine mammals and strandings. Learn about dolphin acoustics, anatomy, culture, communciation, maternity, natural history and physiology and discover what sea lions and manatees eat, where they live and all about their senses. Book a Program Membership Research Education Our Mission -
    Through education, research and rescue, Dolphin Research Center promotes peaceful coexistence,
    cooperation and communication between marine mammals, humans and the environment we share with
    the well being of DRC's animals taking precedence. e-Newsletter Sign-up Follow Us Home | Book a Program | Webcam | Help DRC | Photos | Gift Shop | Member Only Access About DRC | Visit DRC | Memberships & Donations | Privacy Policy Dolphin Research Center ‚Ä¢ 58901 Overseas Highway | Grassy Key, FL 33050-6019 USA Program Reservations Phone: +1 (305) 289-0002 | Office Phone: +1 (305) 289-1121 (office) General Information Email: drc@dolphins.org | Membership: +1 (305) 289-1121 Ext 229 | Fax: +1 (305) 289-8902 Registered 501(c)(3). Dolphins Loyalty > Contactus Contact Us Whom To Contact Contact Us For questions and comments, you can reach us by phone at (305) 943-8000¬†or via mail at: Miami Dolphins, Sun Life Stadium, 347 Don Shula Drive, Miami Gardens, Fla., 33056. Players, Cheerleaders & Mascot Please note that our staff, players and cheerleaders handle their own fan mail and autograph requests. We urge fans not to send items of value for autographs as items can get lost in the mail. The Miami Dolphins organization is not responsible for unanswered autograph requests or unreturned items. Mail can be sent to: Miami Dolphins, ATTN: Staff, Player or Cheerleader Name, 7500 SW 30th Street, Davie, Florida, 33314. Fan Packs and Pocket Schedules equests for Dol-Fan Packs, team photos and pocket schedules must be made in writing to the Miami Dolphins. E-mails and faxes are not accepted. Requests can be mailed to: Miami Dolphins Community Relations, Sun Life Stadium, 347 Don Shula Drive, Miami Gardens, Fla., 33056. Full-Time Employment Currently, the Dolphins are at full staff and have no employment opportunities available at this time. Resumes can be sent in and will be kept on file should we have employment openings in the future. Resumes can be mailed to: Miami Dolphins Human Resources, Sun Life Stadium, 347 Don Shula Drive, Miami Gardens, Fla., 33056. Proshop Customer Service is available via the Internet at Proshop Customer Service , or by phone at (866) FIN-8490. Questions about our merchandise? Need help placing an order? Checking on the status of your order? Need return information? We are here to answer all these questions and more. Please feel free to contact us by phone or email with any questions or comments. Fin Club Questions and Concerns For any questions relating to the Fin Club, please first review the FAQ section . If you still can't find an answer to your question, contact our support center at finclub@dolphins.com . FAQ Contact Us Terms and Conditions Privacy Policy ¬© 2013-2014  Miami Dolphins.
